SumInfectedAndCriticalReward: Range: (-inf, inf)',  # Output can vary significantly based on infection rates, unbounded.
SumCriticalCasesReward: Range: (-inf, inf)',  # Output based on cumulative critical cases, can also vary widely.
SumDeathsReward: Range: (-inf, inf)',  # Output based on cumulative deaths, unbounded in negative direction.
SumICUCriticalCasesReward: Range: (-inf, inf)',  # Output based on cumulative ICU critical cases, can vary widely.
SumRecoveriesReward: Range: (-inf, inf)',  # Output based on cumulative recoveries, can be any value.
Stage0Reward: Range: {0, 1}',  # Discrete output based on matching stage.
Stage1Reward: Range: {0, 1}',  # Discrete output based on matching stage.
Stage2Reward: Range: {0, 1}',  # Discrete output based on matching stage.
Stage3Reward: Range: {0, 1}',  # Discrete output based on matching stage.
Stage4Reward: Range: {0, 1}',  # Discrete output based on matching stage.
InfectionAboveThresholdReward: Range: (-inf, inf)',  # Output based on the difference in enforcement actions, can vary widely.
MaxCriticalCasesReward: Range: (-inf, inf)',  # Can return any negative value or zero, making it continuous unbounded.
MinRecoveryReward: Range: (-inf, inf)',  # Output can vary based on minimum recovery levels, unbounded.
InfectionVarianceReward: Range: (-inf, inf)',  # Variance can be any value, indicating stability or instability, unbounded.
